recommendation-high-risk: You have a high health risk. Strongly recommend lifestyle changes and medical consultation.
recommendation-moderate-risk: Consider improving exercise habits and stress management.
recommendation-low-risk: Keep up the good work maintaining a healthy lifestyle.
no-health-checks: You have not completed any health checks yet.
welcome-title: Welcome to the Health Coach App
welcome-description: This tool helps assess your lifestyle health risks and offers personalized recommendations.
consent-intro: Your privacy is important to us. This page explains how we collect and use your data.
consent-personal-data: We collect personal data such as your health check inputs to provide personalized recommendations.
consent-cookie-policy: We use cookies to improve your experience. You can control cookie settings in your browser.
consent-rights: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your data at any time by contacting us.
consent-contact: If you have questions or concerns, please contact us at privacy@example.com.
failed-to-load-check: Failed to load health check data
app-intro: Health Coach App helps you assess your lifestyle health risks and provides personalized recommendations to improve your well-being. Whether you want to track your health, get actionable advice, or simply learn more about healthy habits, this app is for you!
feature-questionnaire: Quick and easy health check questionnaire
test-account-info: Use our test account to explore the app:
privacy-notice: Your privacy is important to us. All your data is securely stored and never shared with third parties. You can read more on our Consent & Data Policy page.
contact-description: If you need my skills, feel free to reach out on LinkedIn:
contact-github-text: This project is open source and available on GitHub:
contact-questions: If you have any questions, feel free to contact me on LinkedIn!
